author: tellison
msg: Fix for HARMONY-167 (java.io.ObjectStreamField.getUnshared() should be isUnshared())

author: nicko
msg: Fix for LOG4NET-72. Moved String.Format call into separate class SystemStringFormat. This class holds the format string and arguments and only performs the String.Format when its ToString method is called.
Added simple test to ensure that the String.Format methods are working correctly and error handling correctly.
Updated the tests project nant.build to copy shared libs into the build output directory.
